name: Starstorm
description:
Our enemies managed to break through all of our defenses. It seems like this is it... However there is one last hope! The Starstorm, our most powerful ship!

Only you can save the planet in this action-packed roguelike. Defend from the invaders, then press on to eliminate the true threat. Collect many powerful weapons and items to protect your people, gather stardust to obtain skins and other equipment, play on up to 4 different difficulties and unlock various achievements. This is the only chance we have got! 

Controls:

Move: WASD
Use Weapons: Left/Right Click
Inventory: Q
Collect: E

FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING! If you have some issues with that, you may want to skip this game.

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/Ten9Bt7t3S
